abstract: As of late afternoon on Thursday, Third Point Re shares traded at $13.03. That’s well above their opening price of $12.25 a share, though off their intraday high of $13.50.
snippet: As of late afternoon on Thursday, Third Point Re shares traded at $13.03. That’s well above their opening price of $12.25 a share, though off their intraday high of $13.50.

headline.main: Third Point Reinsurance Climbs in First Day of Trading

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
